content.text: Hey! I'm a student at the University of Massachusetts studying philosophy. I'm originally from Alabama, but I moved to Massachusetts for college. I live with my grandparents. I like playing guitar. What's your story?

Hey! I'm from Wisconsin and I love the cold weather. I enjoy living in rural areas. I'm thin and I listen to Linkin Park. I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park. I have never told my parents that I don't like vegetables.
Interesting! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks in the park, listen to music, and play basketball.
That's cool! I like to go for walks in the park too. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility.
Yeah, dogs are a lot of work. I have a dog named Buddy. He's a golden retriever.
Yeah, he's a great dog. He's always happy to see me.
That sounds like a great dog to have!
